Name: Cathedral Ward
Description: Enemy DPS cannot exceed 2+10 HP-25% move speed

Name: Chaos Engine
Description: Teleport all crew in current room to random rooms on opposing ship

Name: Fortress Shield
Description: Reduces enemy DPS by 1+20 HP-25% move speed

Name: Heavy Translocator
Description: Teleport self and nearby allied crew to target room.

Name: Parasite Shield
Description: Reduces enemy DPS by 1+25% move speed-5 max HP

Name: Riot Shield
Description: Reduces enemy DPS by 1Stuns nearby enemies for 5 seconds on kill-25% move speed

Name: Ritual Knife
Description: A token of faith and duty. Activate to spill blood upon the ground

Name: Unholy Talisman
Description: Enemy DPS cannot exceed 2+25% move speed-5 maximum HP

Name: Unstable Translocator
Description: Teleport self into target room. 25% Chance to deal 15 HP damage to enemies in target room.
